title: Yohji Yamamoto, the wise warrior of fashion
subhead: For more than four decades, the Japanese fashion designer has continued to surprise with his radical creations. His austere and rebellious style appeals to a new generation of fans, including stars such as Offset, A$AP Rocky and Burna Boy. At 81, the tireless designer unveils his latest women's collection during Paris Fashion Week on Friday.
